scripts.comment: SUGGESTION: Have the Self-Reference make a change in either the angle or the side (or both).

block.l: Canceled Upload. Need name and description to be more than 2 chars

let config = window.galleryConfig || {}; let stage = this.parentThatIsA(IDE_Morph).stage; let image = new Costume(stage.thumbnail(stage.dimensions)).contents.toDataURL('image/png'); let nbm = window.world.children.find((x) => x instanceof NetsBloxMorph); let data = nbm.serializer.format('<room name="@" app="@">%</room>', nbm.room.name, nbm.serializer.app, nbm.getSerializedRole()); let headers = {}; let method = "POST" let bundle = { 'data': data , 'image': image , 'metadata': JSON.stringify(Object.assign({ description: config.description || description, uploader: config.username || username }, (Object.keys(config).length > 0) ? { featured: true } : {})) , 'session-id': window.externalVariables.locationHash }; let makeEntriesFromFormData = function(obj, formData) { for (let key in (obj || {})) { formData.set(key, obj[key]); } return formData.entries(); }; let makeEntriesShim = function(obj, formElem) { let entryMap = new Map() if (formElem !== undefined) { Array.from(formElem.querySelectorAll("input[name]")).forEach((elem) => entryMap.set(elem.name, elem.value)); } for (let key in (obj || {})) { entryMap.set(key, obj[key]); } return Array.from(entryMap.entries()); } let makeQueryString = function(obj, formElem) { let removeCRs = (str) => str.replace(/\r/g, ''); let formData = new FormData(formElem); let entries = (formData.entries !== undefined) ? makeEntriesFromFormData(obj, formData) : makeEntriesShim(obj, formElem); return Array.from(entries).map(([k, v]) => encodeURIComponent(k) + "=" + encodeURIComponent(removeCRs(v))).join("&"); } var output; if (!proc.promise) { proc.promise = new Promise(function() { var props = { method: method, headers: Object.assign({}, { "Content-Type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" }, headers) }; if (method !== "GET") { let params = makeQueryString(bundle); props = Object.assign({}, props, { body: params }); } fetch(window.externalVariables.domain + "/uploads", props); }).then(function(response) { response.text().then(function(body) { output = body; }); }); } else { proc.promise = undefined; return output; } proc.pushContext('doYield'); proc.pushContext();

event.arg:
<blocks app="NetsBlox 1.14.0, http://netsblox.org" version="1.14.0" collabId="item_0_62"><block-definition collabId="item_0_61" s="Upload Work To Gallery" type="command" category="other"><header collabId="item_0_60"/><code collabId="item_0_59"/><inputs collabId="item_0_58"/><script collabId="item_0_57"><block collabId="item_0_56" s="doDeclareVariables"><list collabId="item_0_55"><l collabId="item_0_54">name</l><l collabId="item_0_53">description</l></list></block><block collabId="item_0_52" s="doIf"><block collabId="item_0_51" s="reportLessThan"><block collabId="item_0_50" s="reportStringSize"><block collabId="item_0_49" var="name"/></block><l collabId="item_0_48">2</l><comment collabId="item_0_47" w="159" collapsed="false">See if you can tell what this does...</comment></block><script collabId="item_0_46"><block collabId="item_0_45" s="doAsk"><l collabId="item_0_44">Choose a Name or Identifier...</l></block><block collabId="item_0_43" s="doSetVar"><l collabId="item_0_42">name</l><block collabId="item_0_41" s="getLastAnswer"/></block></script></block><block collabId="item_0_40" s="doIf"><block collabId="item_0_39" s="reportLessThan"><block collabId="item_0_38" s="reportStringSize"><block collabId="item_0_37" var="description"/></block><l collabId="item_0_36">2</l></block><script collabId="item_0_35"><block collabId="item_0_34" s="doAsk"><l collabId="item_0_33">Describe your work briefly</l></block><block collabId="item_0_32" s="doSetVar"><l collabId="item_0_31">description</l><block collabId="item_0_30" s="getLastAnswer"/></block></script></block><block collabId="item_0_29" s="doIfElse"><block collabId="item_0_28" s="reportOr"><block collabId="item_0_27" s="reportLessThan"><block collabId="item_0_26" s="reportStringSize"><block collabId="item_0_25" var="name"/></block><l collabId="item_0_24">2</l><comment collabId="item_0_23" w="159" collapsed="false">See if you can tell what this does...</comment></block><block collabId="item_0_22" s="reportLessThan"><block collabId="item_0_21" s="reportStringSize"><block collabId="item_0_20" var="description"/></block><l collabId="item_0_19">2</l></block></block><script collabId="item_0_18"><block collabId="item_0_17" s="doSayFor"><l collabId="item_0_16">Canceled Upload.  Need name and description to be more than 2 chars</l><l collabId="item_0_15">2</l></block></script><script collabId="item_0_14"><block collabId="item_0_13" s="doReport"><block collabId="item_0_12" s="evaluate"><block collabId="item_0_11" s="reportJSFunction"><list collabId="item_0_10"><l collabId="item_0_9">username</l><l collabId="item_0_8">description</l><l collabId="item_0_7">proc</l></list><l collabId="item_0_6">let config = window.galleryConfig || {};
let stage = this.parentThatIsA(IDE_Morph).stage;
let image = new Costume(stage.thumbnail(stage.dimensions)).contents.toDataURL('image/png');

let nbm  = window.world.children.find((x) => x instanceof NetsBloxMorph);
let data = nbm.serializer.format('<room name="@" app="@">%</room>', nbm.room.name, nbm.serializer.app, nbm.getSerializedRole());

let headers = {};
let method  = "POST"
let bundle  = {
  'data':       data
, 'image':      image
, 'metadata':   JSON.stringify(Object.assign({ description: config.description || description, uploader: config.username || username }, (Object.keys(config).length > 0) ? { featured: true } : {}))
, 'session-id': window.externalVariables.locationHash
};

let makeEntriesFromFormData = function(obj, formData) {
  for (let key in (obj || {})) {
    formData.set(key, obj[key]);
  }
  return formData.entries();
};

let makeEntriesShim = function(obj, formElem) {

  let entryMap = new Map()

  if (formElem !== undefined) {
    Array.from(formElem.querySelectorAll("input[name]")).forEach((elem) => entryMap.set(elem.name, elem.value));
  }

  for (let key in (obj || {})) {
    entryMap.set(key, obj[key]);
  }

  return Array.from(entryMap.entries());

}

let makeQueryString = function(obj, formElem) {
  let removeCRs = (str) => str.replace(/\r/g, '');
  let formData  = new FormData(formElem);
  let entries   = (formData.entries !== undefined) ? makeEntriesFromFormData(obj, formData) : makeEntriesShim(obj, formElem);
  return Array.from(entries).map(([k, v]) => encodeURIComponent(k) + "=" + encodeURIComponent(removeCRs(v))).join("&");
}

var output;

if (!proc.promise) {
  proc.promise = new Promise(function() {
    var props = { method: method, headers: Object.assign({}, { "Content-Type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" }, headers) };
    if (method !== "GET") {
      let params = makeQueryString(bundle);
      props = Object.assign({}, props, { body: params });
    }
    fetch(window.externalVariables.domain + "/uploads", props);
  }).then(function(response) {
    response.text().then(function(body) { output = body; });
  });
} else {
  proc.promise = undefined;
  return output;
}

proc.pushContext('doYield');
proc.pushContext();
</l></block><list collabId="item_0_5"><block collabId="item_0_4" var="name"/><block collabId="item_0_3" var="description"/></list></block></block></script></block></script><scripts collabId="item_0_2"><script x="628.0000009999999" y="1636.8333343333331" collabId="item_0_1"><block collabId="item_0" s="errorObsolete"/></script></scripts></block-definition></blocks>
